website_summaries.verdict: Charming to look at while improving the hosting experience as well.
pros: Spacious and versatile brown wicker cart features a sturdy frame and table top
Features multiple shelves and a storage drawer
cons: Some reviews suggest the material could be of higher quality

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easily put together and looks great!!! I purchased this for a bathroom with very little storage. Holds all of my shampoos, creme rinses, etc, Misc. items that you never know what to do with but tend to use daily. I just wheel it out when bathing and wheel it back into the closet when not in use. Holds everything I need, and I never worry whether I'm forgetting something like I would if I was carrying everything back and forth everyday. The drawer is great for those items rarely used that you have trouble finding places to put, but want them when they are needed.
customer_reviews.author: luvxlk9

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap furniture with poorly designed casters
customer_reviews.text: 2 stars because it looks nice (some of the fake wicker was broken when it arrived but not too badly) and served its initial purpose, which was to stage an area of our house. Price point was decent for that. -3 stars because one wheel broke (where the caster is lightly tack welded to the frame at a bad angle) and so we weren’t able to use it at all.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: The cart itself is nice once built
customer_reviews.text: The cart itself is nice once built. Building it was a completely different story. It was SOOOO difficult to put together. There weren't that many parts and a first glance it seems to be simple. Once I started I realized that most of it was not quite aligned properly making it difficult to get the screws in. Once the screws were started there was next to no space to actually turn the allen wrench to tighten it all down. The space was so small I couldn't get any other tool in there to do it. I don't think I would buy this again because of how difficult the build was.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph D.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble and drawer impossible to pull out
customer_reviews.text: Well, I gambled and the one main reason I went ahead and purchased was because of the drawer. Which simply cannot be pulled out/opened without brute strength, and even then it’s difficult. Assembly was as others stated-holes don’t align well, making this far more time consuming and frustrating to assemble than it should be. The glass insert on top doesn’t really fit well into the opening -it’s not obvious, but it’s not a clean fit. Overall, it looks nice, but without being able to open the drawer, I gave it low ratings.
customer_reviews.author: ariesdragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Due to factory defect
customer_reviews.text: Great dismay with the construction the cart. It looks great -was set up as instructed by manual together and the drawer was the last thing to go in and sure enough it will no go in with ease. Had to push it very hard to get it in....unfortunately we tossed the box or the product would have returned it! Just need proper caster and screw set that flush properly to the panel so that the drawer will proper enter. I would appreciate if the issue can be resolve, without returning the item. Need respond from seller.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking, poor construction. Damaged parts upon delivery. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The entire assembly was very frustrating and took my husband and I almost 2 hours. None of the bolts lined up. In addition, the glass top (cracked upon delivery) does not sit level due to the side welds. The entire unit is crooked. Poor quality. We are returning the item requesting a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with the construction of this cart
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the construction of this cart. It looks great - we put it together and the drawer is the last thing to go in and sure enough it will no go in with ease. We have to push it very hard to get it in....sadly we tossed the box or we would have returned it! So very sad!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bandit

customer_reviews.title: This cart is a nice addition to outdoor furniture and patio
customer_reviews.text: This cart is a nice addition to outdoor furniture and patio, looks great, highly practical, good price. Assembly only had a few minor issues getting things to line up properly, but overall easy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warning - Not an easy build
customer_reviews.text: I think we are going to like the cart for our deck and it appears relatively sturdy. However, I found it very difficult to put together as instructed. I am a fairly handy guy and have actually furnished a 2 bedroom second home almost entirely with IKEA furniture with little problems constructing. I needed a drill with an allen wrench bit to put in the bolts, no way the included tool would have worked.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Seever

customer_reviews.title: Attractive piece
customer_reviews.text: It was fairly easy to put together. It is a very nice looking piece of furniture. Quality seems to be high. Perfect size. I like almost everything about it. The only negative I can think of, is that the draw doesn't open and close easily, but I would still recommend it and would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Susan M

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Unit
customer_reviews.text: The cart is very nice, matches our outdoor furniture, which is why we selected it. Assembly was easy enough until it came to the shelf piece, the screw holes did not match up, we could only screw into three holes, since that was the case, we had to force the drawer into the unit and will not be able to use the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: PDH

customer_reviews.title: really nice... but
customer_reviews.text: a very useful and well put together unit other than the flimsy top piece, me and my wife love it
customer_reviews.author: Merf

customer_reviews.title: Love this piece
customer_reviews.text: Love this piece. I live in Florida and have limited lanai space near my pool. When the grandkids visit the top holds a container with sunblock as well as an assortment of goggles. Shelf holds towels and we use the drawer for water guns and dive sticks. At a pool party we use it for a bar and put kitchen towels, ice and a large tray with appetizers on it. Easy to assemble as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra DeCandio

customer_reviews.title: The slide out drawer is not an easy slide out
customer_reviews.text: Love the sturdiness of this product it’s functional and a perfect match to my other wicker/patio items, a perfect addition for my sunroom
customer_reviews.author: Laveda Tutt

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor cart
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I have gotten a lot of compliments on this. I agree with some of the other reviews about the silver top (so cheap looking) but I flipped it around as suggested. My only comment would be to provide a better looking piece for the top.
customer_reviews.author: JRo123

customer_reviews.title: Perfect TV table for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: We have been searching for a table to fit our TV on the deck. It matches perfectly with our furniture and does the job. Very attractive
customer_reviews.author: MariClaire

customer_reviews.title: Unable to put together
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this looked online but we had to return this item because it couldn’t be assembled. The holes just didn’t align properly and the drawer wouldn’t fit right. I saw in other reviews others had the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Zajac

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. I use it to bring food from ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I use it to bring food from my outdoor dining table to the kitchen. Rolls great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs engineering
customer_reviews.text: Good looking unit. Impossible to construct after hours of trying.
customer_reviews.author: mark h weiss

customer_reviews.title: This serving cart is the perfect size for our porch & patio
customer_reviews.text: This serving cart is the perfect size for our porch & patio. It has a storage drawer so you can store placemats or other miscellaneous items. Sturdy construction and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Campbell

customer_reviews.title: I will stay away from this company in the future
customer_reviews.text: It was missing hardware and was very difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was everything I had hoped for - perfect size, made well, great price!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Looked very nice and needed for a party ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap construction. Casters fell off when putting together. Just tacked on with tack weld. Very disappointed. Looked very nice and needed for a party but was a bust.
customer_reviews.author: DeDe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cart. Relatively easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cart. Relatively easy to assemble. Matched my outdoor furniture perfectly. I use it indoors in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: DinaB10199

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I haven"t used it yet, but it looks very well made..
customer_reviews.author: Tami Lee

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: The cart looks as nice as I expected. It was easy to put together and is a good size. The top shelf could use more support bars.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Bush

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's charming and looks much more expensive than it was.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and good quality. Looks exactly as it does in the picture. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and looks good on my deck!
customer_reviews.author: Jana Roesch

customer_reviews.title: It's an awesome cart! We use it everyday next to our ...
customer_reviews.text: It's an awesome cart ! We use it everyday next to our spa to hold drinks and towels in the drawer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the product
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. It matches my wicker pool furniture set. The drawer is spacious & able to fit lots of snacks, party items (cups, plates, utensils).. It was easy to put together & so easy moving from one place to another. As a matter of fact, my guests noticed it right away as they walked in my pool area. I highly recommend purchasing this beautiful serving tray!
customer_reviews.author: CONNIE

customer_reviews.title: Nice cart
customer_reviews.text: The assembly was pretty easy, although a couple of the bolts would not align up with their designated holes. Cart looks nice. We are using it outside on our pool deck and it fits in with the other furniture.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chesner

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products Outdoor Patio Wicker Serving Bar Cart
feature_bullets: This beautiful multi-brown wicker cart features a sturdy frame and table top for food preparation and serving
The cart moves on 4 wheels with a break mechanism attached for maximum safety and easy mobility
Its all-weather wicker material helps protect from moisture, mold, mildew, sun damage, and the environmental elements while outdoors
It comes equipped with a discreet storage drawer and multiple shelves for storing your favorite drinks and dishes
Overall Dimensions: 39.5i"(L) x 18"(W) x 36.25"(H); Weight Capacity: 88 lbs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars50 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
